summary: This is an email forwarding a press release about Jeffrey Epstein, sent on August 10, 2019, with the subject line indicating the release is being distributed to all media. The document appears to be a brief internal communication regarding media strategy.

events.title: Distribution of Epstein Press Release
events.description: A press release regarding Jeffrey Epstein is forwarded via email with instructions to send it out to all media.

keyFacts: A press release concerning Jeffrey Epstein was prepared for media distribution on August 10, 2019.
The email forwarding the release includes a humorous signature line referencing 'Skynet' and Google.
The document is a brief internal communication, showing coordination of a media response.
